page.title: 04BEXLEYHEATH SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: We are fortunate in Bexleyheath as far as leisure facilities are concerned. There are golf courses, swimming pools, cricket, football and tennis clubs, parks and lakes for water sports. The two main leisure centres are the Crook Log Sports Centre and Splashworld. The Crook Log Sports Centre opened in 1982. It is open to the public betwen 10.00 and 23.00 hrs. daily, and offers the full range of indoor sporting activities. The main hall is used for entertainments ranging from fashion shows to wrestling and snooker tournaments. There are lessons for trampoline, judo, table-tennis, parachuting and dancing. The Committee Rooms can be hired for parties and meetings, food and drink can be obtained at the lounge bar, and young children can be left at the creche.
